== Description ==
Get the size of a directory recursively.

Used by [[Function Reference/get dirsize|get_dirsize()]] to get a directory's size when it contains other directories.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php recurse_dirsize( $directory ); ?>%%%
== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$directory|string|Directory to recurse|required}}

== Return Value ==
{{Return||integer|The size of the directory}}
